title: Uni lecturers protest blocks one lane of Galle road
body_lines: One lane of the road leading to the Presidential Secretariat from Kollupitiya junction was blocked due to a protest march conducted by the university lecturers.
The protest started from Kollupitiya junction against the current moves of the government.
It was reported that nearly 1,000 lecturers from universities around the country participated in the protest march.
